page.title: 10LOCHALSH SCHOOL DRAMA TEAM
page.content: Our school does two plays every year, an English play and a Gaelic play. This year our English play was called "Us and Them".Every one in P4 5 6 and 7 had a part in the play. The play was about two groups of people wanting to settle the same area of land.At first they agree but greed and suspicion drove them on to war and the survivors did not learn anything from it,the lesson being,that people seldom learn from history. For our performance in Plockton we won the Lochalsh Youth Festival Trophy, Junior Section. Later we learned we had also won the S.C.D.A. trophy for the Highland Division,a silver cup called the NELSON CUP.
